title: Boston National Historical Park: Nearby Attractions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Nearby Attractions              Nearby Attractions      National Park Service Areas         Boston Harbor Islands National Recreation Area   (1 mi/1.6 km)          Boston African American National Historic Site  (1 mi/1.6 km)          Longfellow National Historic Site (3 mi/4.8 km)         John F Kennedy National Historic Site (4.4 mi/7 km)         Frederick Law Olmsted National Historic Site (5 mi/8 km)         Adams National Historical Park (10 mi/16 km)         Saugus Ironworks National Historic Site (11 mi/17.7 km)         Salem Maritime National Historic Site (20 mi/32.2 km)         Minute Man National Historical Park (22 mi/35.4 km)         Lowell National Historical Park (30 mi/48.3 km)         Cape Cod National Seashore (93 mi/150 km)        Travel Information Resources         MBTA - Subway, Bus, and Water Shuttle Information         Massport - Logan Airport         Massachusetts Office of Travel and Tourism
